title: Our Bolt.new Fork's Most Requested Feature is FINALLY Here
description:
One of the biggest feature requests for oTToDev, our community driven fork of Bolt.new, has been adding the ability to load existing local projects into the platform to continue working on them. It's finally here thanks to Eduards Ruzga, one of the core maintainers of oTToDev who also has his own YouTube channel!

https://www.youtube.com/@EduardsRuzga

Lot of other amazing people making amazing contributions so I cover some of those as well in this video! We're knocking down all of the high priority items to really turn oTToDev into a mature project.

ALSO - Exciting developments are on the horizon for oTToDev. We're set to announce a strategic partnership that will supercharge the project beyond what we could have even dreamed about when this all started. Stay tuned for updates coming in the next couple of weeks!

If I missed a shoutout for you (lot of PRs coming in!), let me know in the comments and I'll add a mention for you in the pinned comment!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Join the Bolt.diy (previously oTToDev) community over in the oTTomator Think Tank!

https://thinktank.ottomator.ai/

I'm building something BIG behind the scenes:

https://ottomator.ai/

Here is the link to Bolt.diy on GitHub. Check out the README to see future improvements planned!

https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy

Link to the initial roadmap I shared in the video:

https://roadmap.sh/r/ottodev-roadmap-2ovzo

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

00:00 - Intro - Huge Updates!
01:43 - Loading a Local Project in oTToDev + Other Features
05:26 - oTToDev Roadmap
06:23 - New Updates to oTToDev
09:31 - Attach Images to Prompts + Load Git Projects
13:06 - BIG Upcoming Partnership
14:44 - Outro

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Artificial Intelligence is no doubt the future of not just software development but the whole world. And I'm on a mission to master it - focusing first on mastering AI Agents.

Join me as I push the limits of what is possible with AI. I'll be uploading videos at least two times a week - Sundays and Wednesdays at 7:00 PM CDT! Sundays and Wednesdays are for everything AI, focusing on providing insane and practical educational value. I will also post sometimes on Fridays at 7:00 PM CDT - specifically for platform showcases - sometimes sponsored, always creative in approach!
